name: Quasar Queen
description:
A simple turn-based stealth training game, set in the future.  Quasar Queen is challenging, but relaxing and non-violent, with beautiful graphics.

The player character is you.  Currently you occupy a massive spaceship called the Quasar Queen.  Your objective is to earn the captain's recommendation for a promotion.  To do this, you must pass a test:

Without being detected, you must find the key to the Docking Bay area door.  Enter the Docking Bay area and use a scout ship to exit the Quasar Queen and escape.
